name: Rabbids Land
storyline:
Rabbids take over our beloved amusement park!

For some reason unknown to us, Rabbids decide to take over our beloved amusement park.

We do not know their plan; we do not know their intentions. But one thing we are sure of: they are going to make the most of their day out by invading all the attractions!

They don’t intend to queue like everyone else or stay seated during the whole journey!

As Rabbids will always be Rabbids, you’ll see them misusing the rides, going bwaaah at a souvenir shop before stopping in an overpriced themed restaurant.

So whether it’s a sunny or rainy day, just grab your Wii U GamePad and roll the dice to join them!
summary: Rabbids Land is an exclusive Wii U title and the seventh installment in the Raving Rabbids franchise. The game is essentially a mini-game collection that is set around Theme Park attractions of which there are over twenty different activities including a princess castle, pirate boat, haunted house, tunnel of love, roller coaster, and many more.
